subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: In the era of what is known as the Original Six, when the playoffs consisted of only two best-of-seven rounds, the Montreal Canadiens  hoisted Lord Stanley’s silver chalice every year from 1956 to 1960.
snippet: In the era of what is known as the Original Six, when the playoffs consisted of only two best-of-seven rounds, the Montreal Canadiens  hoisted Lord Stanley’s silver chalice every year from 1956 to 1960.
